sentences.en: ...accusations that he had been disrespectful to a police officer.
sentences.cn: ...关于他曾对一名警官无礼的控告。

sentences.en: Children who talk back are regarded as cheeky and disrespectful.
sentences.cn: 顶嘴的孩子被认为是又厚脸皮又不懂礼貌.

sentences.en: Do any of the people you're chatting with online make disrespectful comments?
sentences.cn: 网上聊天的人又给过你无礼的评论 吗 ?

sentences.en: From there he sent me a disrespectful telegram.
sentences.cn: 从那里他给我打了一份无礼的电报.

sentences.en: Heretofore all the campus gossip had seemed merely malicious and disrespectful.
sentences.cn: 在这以前,学校里的一切流言蜚语似乎纯粹是恶意的、无礼的.

sentences.en: Hold your tongue, you disrespectful old bird!
sentences.cn: 住嘴! 你这没规矩的老鸟!

sentences.en: I don't mean to be disrespectful, but what are you doing here?
sentences.cn: 我不是有意冒犯但是你在这干嘛?

sentences.en: I think young people are sometimes disrespectful in their speech.
sentences.cn: 我认为年轻人有时说话失礼.

sentences.en: I've never been tardy, absent, disobedient, slothful or disrespectful.
sentences.cn: 我从未缓慢, 缺席, 不服从, 懒惰或者不敬.

sentences.en: If she slips up, she should apologize for being disrespectful.
sentences.cn: 如果她疏忽大意出了差错, 则应该为“不尊重”表示歉意.

sentences.en: If they ignore our wishes, we believe they are disrespectful.
sentences.cn: 如果他们无视我们的意愿, 我们相信是他们无礼.

sentences.en: It would be disrespectful to decline.
She knew that even that thought was disrespectful to Ellen and felt ashamed of it.
sentences.cn: 她知道甚至这种想法也是对爱伦的不敬,因此为自己感到羞耻.

sentences.en: She refused to put up with the student's disrespectful behavior any longer.
sentences.cn: 她再也不愿忍受学生不敬的举止.

sentences.en: They shouldn't treat their mother in this disrespectful way.
sentences.cn: 他们不能这样无礼地对待亲生母亲。

sentences.en: This attitude is never cruel or disrespectful or malicious.
sentences.cn: 这个态度是从不粗鲁或从不有失敬于人或从不对人有恶意的.

words.tran_cn: 无礼的；失礼的；不尊敬的

trans.tran_cn: 失礼的，无礼的，不尊重的
trans.tran_en: If you are disrespectful, you show no respect in the way that you speak or behave to someone
